title: He Went That Way
description: Charlene Charlemagne was no stranger to danger and a hard partying lifestyle. With her best friend, Gwendolyn, close to her and her boyfriend, Dylan, beside her, she's got all the family she needs in life. With her dark past behind, Charlene is living her life to the fullest until her life took an unexpected turn forever when one small request turned into something life changing. Charlene is left to pick up the pieces of her life and finds herself down a road she never thought she would go. Will some of those choices lead her exactly where she needs to end up or will there be more consequences for her choices?
author: S.T. Jones
